Methods.Name: Account Created
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that an Account has been created.

Methods.Name: Subscription Activated
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that a Subscription has been activated.

Methods.Name: Subscription Cancelled
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that a Subscription has been cancelled.

Methods.Name: Subscription Charge Completed
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that a charge to a Subscription has been completed.

Methods.Name: Subscription Charge Failed
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that a Subscription Charge has failed.

Methods.Name: Subscription Deactivated
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that a Subscription has been deactivated.

Methods.Name: Subscription Payment Overdue
Methods.Description: Wedbhook notification that a Subscription Payment is overdue.

Methods.Name: Subscription Payment Reminder
Methods.Description: Webhook notificaiton that a Subscription Payment reminder is due.

Methods.Name: Subscription Trial Reminder
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that a trial periood of a Subscription has ended.

Methods.Name: Subscription Updated
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that a Subscription has been updated.

Methods.Name: Fulfilment Failed
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that one of more actions failed during Order fulfilment.

Methods.Name: Mailing List Entry Removed
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that an entry is expected to be removed from a mailing list

Methods.Name: Mailing List Entry Updated
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that there is an updated entry in a Mailing List.

Methods.Name: Order Approval Pending
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that approval is required before an order can be completed.

Methods.Name: Order Cancelled
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that an order has been cancelled.

Methods.Name: Order Completed
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that an order has been completed.

Methods.Name: Order Failed
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that an Order has failed.

Methods.Name: Order Payment Pending
Methods.Description: Webhook notificaiton that an Order payment is pending.

Methods.Name: Payout Entry Created
Methods.Description: Webhook notificaiton that a payout event has been created - e.g. for an order, split pay rule, return etc.

Methods.Name: Return Created
Methods.Description: Webhook notification that a refund or a return has been created.
